__TOC__

At the 27/06/2012 1200 UTC Membership meeting we welcomed 3 new
Members to official Ubuntu Membership!

* Joel Addison (<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/JoelAddison|Wiki]]</nowiki>|<nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~joeladdison|Launchpad]]</nowiki>) - Joel is a software engineering student from Brisbane, Australia. His contributions to date have mainly centred around the Ubuntu-AU LoCo as well as localisation activities.

* James Henstridge (<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/JamesHenstridge|Wiki]]</nowiki>|<nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~jamesh|Launchpad]]</nowiki>) - James has been using and working on Ubuntu since 2004. He currently work on Ubuntu One for Canonical as well as previously contributing to the Launchpad development team.

* Mohamed Alaa (<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/MohamedAlaa|Wiki]]</nowiki>|<nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~m-alaa8|Launchpad]]</nowiki>) - Mohamed is a 13 year old python programmer from Egypt. Mohamed has made contributions to translation efforts and bug triaging.

The Membership results from the 21st June Meeting of the 2200 Board are as follows:
* Roman Yepishev (<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/RomanYepishev|Wiki]]</nowiki>|<nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~rye|Launchpad]]</nowiki>) - He is currently involved in the Ubuntu One project, helping with ubuntuone-scripts, indicator-ubuntuone and some other services. He is also one of the OpenStack testers. 
* Nadeen Spirit (<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/nadeen-spirit|Wiki]]</nowiki>|<nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~nadeen-spirit|Launchpad]]</nowiki>) - She is one of the active members of the Egypt LoCo team. She gives talks about Ubuntu at her college, helps people not only installing Ubuntu on their machines but also helping them with any problems they encounter.
* Nicholas Skaggs (<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/balloons|Wiki]]</nowiki>|<nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~nskaggs|Launchpad]]</nowiki>) - Nicholas is one of the guys behind QA. He does loads of great stuff.
* Matt Fischer (<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/MattFischer|Wiki]]</nowiki>|<nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~mfisch|Launchpad]]</nowiki>) -  Matt is involved in triaging bugs with the Bug Squad. He also likes writing stuff for Unity and he is one of the members of the Accomplishments team.
* Marc Cluet (<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/lynxman|Wiki]]</nowiki>|<nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~lynxman|Launchpad]]</nowiki>) - Marc is a member of the Server team. He maintains mcollective* and a few other packages. He is also an Orchestra developer.
* Kurt Belgrave (<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/trinikrono|Wiki]]</nowiki>|<nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~trinikrono|Launchpad]]</nowiki>) - Kurt is doing an awesome job with bringing Trinidad & Tobago LoCo team back alive. He organised events and helped spread Ubuntu. He also likes triaging bugs.
